title: browser integration
extract: A browser extension is a small software application that adds a capacity or functionality to a web browser. ... HTTPS Everywhere - provides another layer of security by making websites that support the extension automatically connect through HTTPS.
extract_html: A browser extension is a small software application that adds a capacity or functionality to a web browser. ... HTTPS Everywhere - provides another layer of security by making websites that support the extension automatically connect through HTTPS.
